content: At the min I've given 1 star, it's not accepting my facial recognition its saying that its basically not me... for something that should be simple it certainly is not. Not got the time to be arsing around. App is being Deleted.

The Covid vaccination records are perfect. I just wish they could actually be used for something. People who have been vaccinated should have some benefits from doing it! It's perfect for ordering repeat prescriptions too without having to bother my doctor's surgery.

Utterly usless. Following the indetification process I am unable to follow futher steps to obtain my Covid Passport to travel home. The message within the app states "Sorry we cannot connect to your GP". I have also noticed that my NHS number within the app doesn't match the one I have at my practice. Trying to resolve it now seems like a hamster wheel. There is no number to contact or ask for this to be resolved quicker.

Apparently it needs constant internet access and throws you to an error screen if you ever disconnect. This makes it useless for showing vaccine status since I don't have mobile internet. Other apps at least let you stay in the last screen you opened as long as you don't try to do anything that requires more data, for example with airline apps you can navigate to your boarding passes and show them at boarding even if you have no internet at that time.
Won't let me get onto the app. Not able to down load have tried for 3 days.
Cannot book Triage Appointment, shows limit reached, yet never booked one using the app!
Every time I go on the app it's saying webpage not available. Set everything up no problem now I can't get back on

Just the same as previous comment. I got to the bit where you have to video yourself saying the requested numbers and it won't take the video, just the sound. Please fix so I can prove my Covid status. The video on my phone works fine, so fault is not this end.
Useless garbage.
Can't even register with the app, gets stuck part way through the process. Is very broken and utterly useless as is.
Can't use it without being registered with GP
Will not open just keeps saying stopped, need this app to book a short break to prove totally vaccinated
It will not open!
App works for UK🇬🇧 nationals. EU nationals🇪🇺 have issue on opening the camcorder. They can not get Covid 19 status letter. Please fix the issue.

I am 53, long term disabled. I have never driven, I have not been abroad for over 10 years which means I have no photo I.D. so I can download the app, I can sign in to the app as it recognises all my details yet I cannot use any of the apps features because I have no photo ID.
Useless. OK till scan photo.

Frustrating. Got up to the use of the camcorder easily on my phone and then it wouldn't submit. Tried several times (for each try had to log in again & go through adding passport details etc). No luck. Tried on my tablet: Went better as camcorder worked, saw my video, submitted but then nothing happened?? Please advise me how to sort this out? Update; I contacted NHS support and they were very helpful and it finally worked via my tablet so have changed review from 1 to 3 stars
NHS England only even though it's NHS.UK! Little England at it's best. You should make it 100% clear on the home page that this app is for England only.
Great app easy to use
Takes a bit setting up but once done it works as expected

I found installation of this app surprisingly easy on both own and wife's phone. What an improvement compared with the previous medical app where I needed photo and driving licence to match. Congratulations! Completely logical and intuitive. Very well done. Result is that I can see all my meds and most important my covid certificate of vaccination. I have no idea why the app appears to have such a low rating. Not at all justified in my opinion. Graham

First impressions: goodish, then became irritated when adding symptoms of vaccination side effects. Each symptom demanded start and end date entry, no 'copy last start & end dates' function, very tiresome. Also, the date validation gets its knickers in a twist because of the yyyy/mm/dd entry format when it tries to validate before you've finished. Probably a US date format issue. Also, you can't re-edit a previously saved record to add missed optional data easily. You have go down another path.
Asks you for more and more information to sign up until eventually something gets rejected without explanation. Total waste of time.
Works pretty well. I get all the information I need although the process is a but clunky to start with.

Gents, if you've grown a lockdown beard don't bother with this app! It wants photo ID (passport/driver's license) followed by a video of you repeating numbers only to wait 24 hours to be given a load of guff about ID not passing checks. TWICE! I'm in financial services so I know how to get a good copy of a peice of ID, only difference between ID photos is I now wear a beard! Absolutely useless.
Could not register via the app. Did not give me the option. Pretty rubbish really. Once I did a work around iand finally set up an account it's fine
Bad
Unable access anything have use different app to access medical records.
When you click on appointments and log in with patients know best. Your hospital appointments don't show!
This app will not install on my phone i have tried quite a few times now any advice
Useless and frustrating
Would work it keep saying send code don't get it but every time a go on it it I have to but details in over and over can't put my nhs number in it doesn't give you the option
Very useful and easy to use.
Very helpful cannot fault it very accurate keep you safe when going into venue's.

I was asked to provide three pieces of info so that he app can connect to my gp. The surgery provided the Linkage Key, ODS code and Account ID. when all were entered the system refused to accept the Lnkage Key, and the surgery was unable to help confirming that some of their staff had the same problem. Some friends also had same problem. However my wife using the same type of phone, same surgery, had absolutely no problem and did not have to enter the above info at all.
Doesn't work. Keep taking me in cycles for login

Unable to use app as it asks me to record me saying some numbers but won't open into my video to record it and it I try to open my camera and record it when go back into app it them gives me four different numbers. Not good at all. I know other people we just entered there NHS number and didn't have to provide photographic evidence or video of numbers. Not good especially as this app shows I've had my covid vaccinations which is reason I wanted to down load it in the first place

Very buggy, the only use is to get the NHS number, any other feature is useless. Feel kinder bad for the developers, they need to fix the usability of this app. Also concerned about gathering all this data

I'm concerned about the other companies, or organisations the app is linked with. Patient Access is mentioned and I want nothing to do with the incompetent people running that. I refuse to share my data when I don't know what'll happen to it. I had to ask Patient Access to remove all my information. Their app stopped working and they couldn't fix it. I do not want my data grabbed or sold. Even by a back door. It seems that you need to be a trained-in-privacy-policy solicitor these days to understand what you're signing up to.

Absolutely useless! I get through to the section where it asks for a video of me saying the numbers.........I must have tried it 30 plus times, from my phone, my partner's phone.......no matter what I do, it picks up the voice, but you can't see me, so no way I can prove who I am & use the app properly. Needs an app building by people who actually know what they're doing as this is beyond useless!
good

I downloaded the NHS App and followed the instructions while having my NHS number to hand. Installed without any issues on my Xiaomi Mi A2 running Android 10. Logs in with my fingerprint and displays my Covid vaccination status. Does the job.
The app keeps crashing. Useless.
Awful app, gave up trying to log in after half an hour..uninstalled

What a waste of time that was. The system did not recognise my GP postcode, which is a military base. It just threw me off the system... What is rhe point of a system that only has functionality for those who are part of the traditional GP surgery system, with no option for those outside that system; even though my NHS number was provided.
definitely wouldn't recommend - very convoluted and unclear as to what's required and where/when

Even though the app can find my details, because my GP does not connect to the NH S system I cannot get to the Covid certification status. This is very frustrating, if you want us to use the app as evidence of vaccination status why does the connection to my GP matter? Pls get rid of this step

Total garbage. The app doesn't work and the support organisation is a joke. They don't actually do anything. I mean, they do nothing. I'm a seasoned IT professional and I've seen some rubbish in my time but never anything as unprofessional, inept or useless as this. Sadly, I don't know who provides this "service" or lack of it but they wouldn't work very long for me. Frankly, it's a disgrace. They should be ashamed.
Easy to setup and use, painless. I don't know what everyone is moaning about! Welcome to the 21st century
Very thorough and well planned app. Easy to use.
Very bad

Easy to register my email, but impossible to prove my identity. It keeps rejecting my videos. The error message is not very useful, as none of the 3 things listed seem to be wrong in my particular case
Web based App. Very handy. One thing I would like is having the 2FA done via Authenticator instead of SMS.

absolutely hopeless .unable to download..

content: The app is registered with my old phone how do I change it
replyContent:
You can amend your associated mobile phone number by logging into the app, going to More (in the top-right corner), then 'NHS login'. Alternatively, you can change your details here:
https://account.login.nhs.uk/#/manage-nhs-login
For security reasons, you'll need to log in with the same email and password you use to log in to the NHS App.

content: Unable to be used in Wales, Scotland and N.I. what a shock
replyContent: The NHS App is not available in Northern Ireland, Scotland or Wales because their health services are devolved. You can still use the NHS App to check your symptoms and find out what to do when you need help urgently, even if you're outside of England. However, GP services are only available to patients registered with a GP surgery in England.

replyContent: Thank you for your review. To log out of the NHS App: 1. Click the More at the top right of the app. This opens the More menu. 2. Select the 'Log out' button below 'Login and password options'. After 10 minutes of inactivity on the app, you'll be logged out automatically.

content: What an unfriendly app! If you haven't been to the doctor recently or registered with their online system this app is rubbish. You need to send a photo of photo id, e.g. passport, then upload a video, then wait for them to approve it, which could take weeks. I don't look much like my passport photo (which was taken years ago) so I am not expecting them to approve it....
replyContent: We are sorry that you've had difficulties registering with us. We require either a passport or driving licence in order to register through the App, due to security of medical records. Alternatively you can contact your GP surgery and request three access credentials - A linkage key (also called passphrase), ODS code and Account ID.

content: Impressive features, I look forward to making use of them to reduce the time I spend trying to get through to my GP's surgery. My biggest gripe is that the app breaks the Android back button. It doesn't take you BACK to the previous page, it tries to log you out of the app every time press use it. To get back, you need to tap a link on the page, also marked "Back". Otherwise I would have given the app 5 stars. It was ironic to have to submit my passport and a video of myself given that anyone who knows my name, date of birth and address can access / alter this information over the phone with my GP's surgery. I suspect that this is more of a problem with my GP's surgery than this app though. I'm also surprised that it's acceptable to restrict full access to the app to people who have paid to have a form of photo ID given the claims made about measures to combat election fraud recently.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. Please be advised your comments have been noted. If there is anything we can help you with, please let us know.
